sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:b0cafae9eba902105204f635cad0cd3c=2^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Constituent Connect">bfe53424479902504f6574fc416d4337</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>200</order><published_ref/><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
		var typeVal = g_form.getValue('select_service_type');
        if (typeVal == '1') {
            //This is a service request
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_services', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_services', true);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
        } else if (typeVal == '2') {
            //This is an info request
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_information_requests', true);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_information_requests', true);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
        } else if (typeVal == '3') {
            //This is a license or permit request
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', true);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_services', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
            g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', true);
        }
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	//alert("Hello");
    g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_services', false);
    g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
    g_form.setMandatory('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
    g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_services', false);
    g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_information_requests', false);
    g_form.setVisible('select_from_existing_license_or_permit', false);
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Hide selection of services when create new picked</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jspirko</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-02 04:45:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b100da3d475d42104f6574fc416d43a2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide selection of services when create new picked</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="15-Minute Service MVP" source="x_snc_15_minute_se">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="15-Minute Service MVP">9c753ca0479902504f6574fc416d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_b100da3d475d42104f6574fc416d43a2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>jspirko</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-14 04:40:29</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
